title: zed last hitting
body: i suck at last hitting with most champs however whenever i pick zed i do exceptional which is a pain as i dislike playing him. Is there a secret to making last hitting easier with my favorite champs?{{champion:50}} {{champion:27}} {{champion:74}}

replies.body: I swear we get about 3 stupid ideas a day

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=MNM4A33N,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-11T07:13:45.686+0000)
>
> I swear we get about 3 stupid ideas a day

Way more than 3 surely...

Spend time practicing your last hitting.

I'm not good at it, so I became a jungle main. Kappa.

Make sure your connection is perfect, and that you're using cable not Wifi.
Your connection will effect your CS, how often I've last hit a minion only for the lag to credit it to another minion instead of me.

Several streamers/pros have said from time to time that if you need practice on last hitting, take some AD runes. If CS is your problem, taking AD runes instead of AP wont effect your gameplay very much.

Last bit of advice I can give is to make sure you're not cancelling your auto attacks. I'll miss about 5 CS on average due to canceling my AA.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
So pretty much take out the simplest thing you could do in league and make it easier ?

Zed is the easiest champ in the game to last hit with that's for sure.
As for secret to your favourite champs the answer is practice more
